about-radio.legend: What would you like to contact us about?

type-radio.legend: What type of certificate did you order?

about-radio.complaint: Is your complaint about an existing order?

legend.default: Is your enquiry about an existing order?

previous-radio.summary: Have you already enquired about this issue?

about-radio.complaint: Have you already complained about this issue?

legend.default: Have you previously been in contact about this?

about-radio.wrong-certificate: Tell us the full names of the person in the certificate you requested
about-radio.damaged: Whose name, including all middle names, is on the certificate you received?

label.default: Whose name, including any middle names, is on the certificate you ordered?

person-one.label: Tell us the full names of party one on the certificate you requested

person-two.label: Tell us the full names of party two on the certificate you requested (optional)

additional-text.label: What else would you like to tell us about your enquiry?

additional-names.label: Whose name(s), including any middle names, is on the certificate you received?

additional-radio.summary: Have you already enquired about this issue?
additional-radio.legend: Have you previously been in contact about this enquiry?

how-radio.legend: How did you place your order?

online-toggle-text.label: What is your COL number? (Optional)
online-toggle-text.hint: Please enter one if you have received one. A COL number is a Certificate Online number that is sent in the confirmation email when certificates are ordered online. COL numbers typically look like this COL123456/2015.

telephone-toggle-text.label: What is your order number?
telephone-toggle-text.hint: Your order number would have been given to you when you ordered by telephone. Order numbers typically look like this: 12345-1

telephone-toggle-text-2.label: What is the account number?
telephone-toggle-text-2.hint: The account number will have been given to you when you placed your order by post. Account numbers consist of between 1 and 8 digits, so look like 12345678, but without a dash and extra number on the end.

which-radio.legend: Which service did you pay for?

when-date.legend: When did you place your order?

country-select.label: Select a country
country-select.hint: Start to type the country name and options will appear
